alert.note: Alert for Western Uinta Basin; Western Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 2:08PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Duchesne County through 245 PM MDT... At 208 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles northwest of Roosevelt, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Roosevelt, Duchesne, Myton, Starvation Reservoir, Altamont, Cedarview, Utahn, Bridgeland, Upalco, Mountain Home, Arcadia, Neola and Altonah. This includes the following highways... US Route 40 between mile markers 84 and 115. Utah Route 35 between mile markers 60 and 62. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Western Uinta Basin; Western Uinta Mountains
